main.name: Jerome Caruso
main.description: Learning and developing my skills with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and React
main.bio: I am a highly motivated person with a love for problem solving and working through different scenarios to find all solutions that may work.  I enjoy working in large groups which I have done through open source projects but I also find comfort in working on projects to find and learn solutions through my own resources. I always want to keep learning new ways to improve my code, my problem solving skills and ways I can use code to someday help people.
main.contactmessage: If you would like to reach me please email me here!

resume.skillmessage: I am a highly motivated person with a love of problem solving and working through diffirent scenrios to find the solution, wether in be in a solo situation or working together in a large group. I want to keep learning about new ways to improve my code, problem solving skills and ways I can use code to someday help people.

testimonials.text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
“The world rewards you for creating things it doesn’t know how to get for itself.
